headline: Quanta Services (PWR) Positioned to Benefit From Rising Power Infrastructure Investment
summary: Sands Capital Management, LLC‘s Technology Innovators Fund released its Q4 2025 investor letter for “Technology Innovators Fund”. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. The Fund delivered mixed performance during the fourth quarter of 2025, as market returns were increasingly driven by a narrow group of large-cap growth stocks, with the portfolio’s top […]
